items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
8% increased Attack Speed
+52 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances and elemental ailment immunity to you and your allies.
explicitMods: +1.7 metres to radius
40% increased Area of Effect
You and nearby allies gain +32% to all Elemental Resistances
You and nearby allies are Immune to all Elemental Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Animates a melee weapon or armour, attaching it to an invisible Guardian that fights by your side. Animating multiple items attaches them to the same Guardian. You cannot animate unidentified items. Cannot be used by Traps or Mines.
explicitMods: 64% increased Minion Maximum Life
Can use Items requiring up to Level 76
Minions' Attacks deal 111 to 162 additional Physical Damage
Minions deal 64% increased Physical Damage with Melee Attacks
Minions have 40% increased Movement Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleports the character to a nearby monster and attacks with a melee weapon. If no specific monster is targeted, one is picked at random. Grants a buff that increases movement speed for a duration. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Frenzy Charge.
explicitMods: Base duration is 3.00 seconds
10% increased Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
20% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit
Buff grants 20% increased Movement Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Soulthirst
explicitMods: +62 to maximum Life
+15% to all Elemental Resistances
30% increased Mana Recovery from Flasks
21% reduced Flask Effect Duration
Gain Soul Eater during any Flask Effect
Lose all Eaten Souls when you use a Flask
flavourText: "They say a draught of fine spirits will ward off
the elements and promote a longer, merrier life.
I have found this to be true on all counts."
- Zerphi of the Vaal

items.name: Replica Sorrow of the Divine
explicitMods: Life Recovery from Flasks also applies to Energy Shield during Effect
49% increased Duration
Eldritch Battery during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "Success! Prototype #54 has tapped into that sliver of divinity that exists within.
Faith fuels the flesh, and the flesh fuels the fire..."

items.name: The Red Trail
explicitMods: 100% increased Armour
+93 to maximum Life

10% additional Physical Damage Reduction while stationary
Gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit while Bleeding
50% chance to be inflicted with Bleeding when Hit by an Attack
Gore Footprints
flavourText: We leave a trail, that we may know
where never we will return.
